mapper.select: SELECT PROFESSOR_MENU_CODE , PROFESSOR_MENU_NAME , PROFESSOR_MENU_URL FROM PROFESSOR_MENU ORDER BY PROFESSOR_MENU_CODE
SELECT PROFESSOR_SUB_MENU_CODE , PROFESSOR_SUB_MENU_NAME , PROFESSOR_SUB_MENU_URL , PROFESSOR_MENU_CODE FROM PROFESSOR_SUB_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = #{menuCode}

SELECT LEC.LEC_NO , LEC_NAME , DECODE(LEC_DAY, '월', '1', '화', '2', '수', '3', '목', '4', '금', '5') AS LEC_DAY , START_TIME , FINISH_TIME FROM LECTURE LEC, LECTURE_TIME LT WHERE LEC.LEC_NO = LT.LEC_NO AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND LEC_STATUS = 'Y'
AND LEC_STATUS = #{lecStatus}
AND UPPER(LEC_NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{lecName})||'%'
ORDER BY LEC.LEC_NO DESC
